content: If you're planning to participate in the FHIR Connectathon Bulk Data Track this Thursday and Friday, please fill out the poll below around the best time for our daily check in calls on Zoom. We'll be keeping our usual time for the bi-weekly Argonaut Bulk Data call as well on Thursday at 2pm ET.

/poll Proposed times: 10am and 3pm ET (GMT-4)
These times work for me
I can make one of the times
I can't make either time

Also, be sure to add yourself to the sign up sheet at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1k4BZMOS2b-U8LuBo9aw5CqcFj2dh7tQiNlAp48pPSdA/edit#gid=0 and review the track description at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-05+Bulk+Data+Track .
Great! I added these checkin times and the Zoom link to the track Confluence page. Also, we will be cancelling the Argonaut meeting this Thursday so folks can concentrate on the Connectathon.
Will there be track activities this afternoon after general session?

The current plan is to do a formal kickoff tomorrow morning at 10am ET on Zoom, though folks can certainly start testing using the server and clients listed on the sign up sheet and coordinate on this stream ahead of that. I'm open to jumping on a Zoom after the kickoff though if there's interest...
